text: To insure peace of mind ignore the rules and regulations.
author: George Ade

text: To injure an opponent is to injure yourself. To control aggression without inflicting injury is the Art of Peace.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

text: The world must be made safe for democracy. Its peace must be planted upon the tested foundations of political liberty.
author: Woodrow Wilson

text: I know I had no hand in making this war, and I know I will make more sacrifices today than any of you to secure peace.
author: William Tecumseh Sherman

text: In my opinion, if we have not achieved peace, it is because people forget its most fundamental aspect. Before we talk about peace among nations, we must settle our peace with God.
author: Sun Myung Moon
